> <OLD - Nightlight>
>
> "Talon and I are friends"said Nightlight*She was very kind with me when
> you... dissapeared" Nightlight surpriced by his reaction, the true Rodimus
> never have been jealous"She and Toucson are in love"

<NEW>

There was a dark look from RODIMUS as he looked at NIGHTLIGHT, as if
studying her reactions, then he nodded, "Talon?" He said, his dark
mood passing as quickly as it came, "I should have known. That is fine
and well then."

He was evidently satisfied in what he saw from NIGHTLIGHT's face. He
sat down in front of his personal console in the room and the screen
in front of him. He tapped in a few few commands and the screen
quickly came alive, showing the image of TUSCON in dragon mode with
several other Maximals standing around him, one of them even riding on
his back. He appeared to be in some sort of large prison cell, perhaps
an excercise or work out section.

There were three Sharkticon looking guards watching TUSCON and the
others with him with mixtures of derision and boredom. There was no
sound comming from the screen, it was a purely visual display.

"Give me one good reason why I shouldn't crush his spark." DARK
RODIMUS said as he looked at the screen, his finger tapping on the
console in an odd beat. It meant nothing of itself, but it was
something that the old RODIMUS used to do when he was trying to come
to a decision that no one else agreed with.

(TAG)

Preston
